p: Table 3 shows the inhibition activities of the various seaweed species on the a-glucosidase enzyme. Methanolic extract of brown seaweed S. ilicifolium showed significantly ( P < 0.05) lower IC 50 value of 38.49 ppm, followed by H. macroloba with an IC 50 value of 71.77 ppm, while U. intestinalis recorded IC 50 value above 200 ppm. The control (quercetin) showed significant effects of a-glucosidase activity with the lowest IC 50 value of 16.53 ppm.
